mapper.select: SELECT b.c_userid cUserid, b.c_username cUsername, b.c_loginname cLoginname, ROUND(a.n_zjnl, 2) nNlhz FROM ( SELECT c_userid, sum(n_zjnl) n_zjnl FROM t_green_nl_zjnlmx where c_zjyy != '5' GROUP BY c_userid ORDER BY n_zjnl DESC ) a, plate_user b WHERE a.c_userid = b.c_userid ORDER BY a.n_zjnl DESC LIMIT 0,10

select b.c_username cUsername,b.c_loginname cLoginname,a.n_nlhz nNlhz,a.c_userid cUserid,a.c_bz cBz from t_green_nl_hz a , plate_user b where a.c_userid = b.c_userid AND a.c_zt='1'
AND b.c_username LIKE "%" #{cUsername} "%"
AND a.n_nlhz >= #{nNlzlQ}
AND #{nNlzlZ} >= a.n_nlhz
order by a.n_nlhz,b.c_username desc

SELECT x1.c_username, x.c_userid, ROUND(x.n_nlhz, 2) n_nlhz, x.rank FROM ( SELECT t.*, ROUND(@rownum := @rownum + 1) AS 'rank' FROM (SELECT @rownum := 0) r, ( SELECT c_userid, sum(n_zjnl) n_nlhz FROM t_green_nl_zjnlmx WHERE c_zjyy != '5' GROUP BY c_userid ORDER BY n_nlhz DESC ) AS t ) x, plate_user x1 WHERE x.c_userid = x1.c_userid and x1.c_zt = '1' and x.c_userid = #{c_userid}
